title: Salt Bride
description: 2011 Australian Romance Readers Awards Favorite Historical Romance England, 1763. The Earl of Salt Hendon and squire's daughter Jane Despard share a secret past of mistrust, heartache, and misery. Forced into a marriage neither wants, the patient and ever optimistic Jane believes love conquers all; the Earl will take some convincing. Enter Diana St. John, who will go to extremes, even murder, to hold the Earl's attention. Can the newlyweds overcome past prejudices and sinister opposition to fall in love all over again? SALT HENDON series book 1Character-driven romantic suspenseNon explicit (mild sensuality)Story length 117,000 words
author: Lucinda Brant
